text:
@realDonaldTrump @FoxNews Don't whine. You still have #BloodOnHisHandsHannity and all the blondes to spread lethal lies. Besides, it's hard to bamboozle people when their family and friends are getting sick and dying. Even FOX knows that. 

#coronavirus
